ns:common.document.text: OpenT is an open-source programming language/IDE created by the senior members of CompSci.ca (dTeam). OpenT serves to provide a learning environment for high school students. The motivation was to provide a proper learning experience for students who are taught programming using Holtsoft's Turing, which is common in many Ontario high schools. The Turing environment boasts a $75 for students , which can be a detriment to students who want to learn and do their assignments at home.
